page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE KILMARNOCK
page.content: ON SATURDAY,25.5.85,I GOT UP AT 8.28am.AND WENT FOR MY BREAKFAST WHICH WAS A PIECE OF TOAST WITH A DRINK OF FRESH RIBENA. THEN I GOT WASHED, BRUSHED MY TEETH AND WENT UPSTAIRS TO GET DRESSED. AT 9.15am.I HELPED DAD TO PLANT SOME SWEET PEAS. AT 10.00am.MY DAD,MY BROTHER AND I WENT INTO TOWN TO BUY ME EARINGS. THEN WE WENT TO THE LIBRARY FOR BOOKS AND THEN TO PORTLAND BOWLING CLUB COFFEE MORNING WHERE I WON A BOTTLE OF TALC.AT 12.25 WE WENT HOME FOR LUNCH (SPLIT PEA SOUP,POTATOES,ROAST BEEF AND CARROTS) AT 1am.I WENT TO MY GRANS AND TOOK HER DOG FOR A WALK. AT 2am.WE WENT TO AYR TO GET SOME MESSAGES AND WHEN WE CAME HOME I FED THE CALVES AND HELPED AROUND THE FARM. AFTER TEA I WENT TO SEE MARY HODGE AT DELSANGAN FARM TILL 9.15pm THEN HOME AND IN BED AT 10.40.
